snippet: LENNIGER--Sr. Barbara. A Dominican Sister of Sparkill since 1951, Sr. Barbara was teacher, administrator (1953- 85) and the founder and Executive Director of Thorpe Family Residence and Park Avenue Thorpe. Visitation: Wednesday, April 6, 3:30- 8:00pm. Mass Thursday, April 7 at 10:30am (Dominican Convent, 175 Rte. 340, Sparkill, NY). In lieu of flowers, donations to Dominican Sisters, Sr. Mary Murray, President. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LENNIGER--Sr. Barbara.
